original_text: And God did so that night: for it was dry upon the fleece only, and there was dew on all the ground.
korean_text: 그 밤에 하나님이 그대로 행하시니 곧 양털만 마르고 그 주변 땅에는 다 이슬이 있었더라

sentences.original_text: And God did so that night:
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 하나님께서 그 밤에 그렇게 하셨습니다:

sentences.original_text: for it was dry upon the fleece only,
and there was dew on all the ground.
